ST09-001.name: Yamato ST09-001
ST09-001.effect: [DON!! x1] [Opponent's Turn] If you have 2 or less Life cards, this Leader gains +1000 power.

ST09-002.name: Uzuki Tempura ST09-002
ST09-002.effect: [Trigger] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less and add this card to your hand.

ST09-004.name: Kaido ST09-004
ST09-004.effect: [DON!! x1] If you have 2 or less Life cards, this Character cannot be K.O.'d in battle.

ST09-005.name: Kouzuki Oden ST09-005
ST09-005.effect: [DON!! x1] This Character gains [Double Attack]. [On K.O.] You may trash 2 cards from your hand: Add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your Life cards.

ST09-007.name: Shinobu ST09-007
ST09-007.effect: [Blocker] [On Block] You may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life cards to your hand: This Character gains +4000 power during this battle.

ST09-008.name: Shimotsuki Ushimaru ST09-008
ST09-008.effect: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] You may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life cards to your hand: Play up to 1 yellow {Land of Wano} type Character card with a cost of 4 or less from your hand.

ST09-009.name: Fugetsu Omusubi ST09-009
ST09-009.effect: [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 1 or less and add this card to your hand.

ST09-010.name: Portgas D. Ace ST09-010
ST09-010.effect: [Once Per Turn] If this Character would be K.O.'d, you may trash 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life cards instead.

ST09-012.name: Yamato ST09-012
ST09-012.effect: [When Attacking] You may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life cards to your hand: This Character gains +2000 power until the start of your next turn.

ST09-014.name: Narikabura Arrow ST09-014
ST09-014.effect: [Counter] If you have 2 or less Life cards, give up to 1 of your opponent's Leader or Character cards âˆ’3000 power during this turn. [Trigger] You may trash 2 cards from your hand: Add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your Life cards.

ST09-015.name: Thunder Bagua ST09-015
ST09-015.effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, if you have 2 or less Life cards, add up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less to the top or bottom of the owner's Life cards face-up. [Trigger] Draw 1 card.
